quests.desc: Welcome to TextWorld! Here is how to play! First, it would be great if you could pick up the safe key from the table in the Bedroom. Once you have picked up the safe key, retrieve the safe key from the table. Then, check that the door inside the Bedroom is unlocked with the safe key. And then, open the door in the Bedroom. If you have pulled open the door, take a trip east. And then, take the bottle of water from the table within the Kitchen. Alright, thanks!
commands: take bottle of water from table
take bottle of water from table

quests.desc: Hey, thanks for coming over to TextWorld! Please recover the glasses from the table in the Bedroom.

Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First step, retrieve the safe key from the table. With the safe key, insert the safe key into the door in the Bedroom's lock to unlock it. Then, make it so that the door is ajar. Then, make an effort to head east. And then, recover the apple from the table within the Kitchen. With the apple, eat the apple. That's it!
Your objective is to pick up the safe key from the table.

Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. Your first objective is to pick up the safe key from the table within the Bedroom. Then, unlock the door in the Bedroom. Then, open the door. Got that? Good!

Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an life changing round of TextWorld? You do! Here is your task for today. First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to take the safe key from the table. After getting the safe key, assure that the door is unlocked with the safe key. After that, ensure that the door is open. Then, venture east. And then, recover the apple from the table within the Kitchen. After picking up the apple, eat the apple. That's it!

infos.name: Kitchen
infos.desc:
You are in a Kitchen. A normal one. The room is well lit.

 You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a table. The table is typical.[if there is something on the s_2] On the table you make out [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though.[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading west.

infos.name: Bedroom
infos.desc:
You are in a Bedroom. An ordinary kind of place. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?

 You scan the room, seeing a table. The table is standard.[if there is something on the s_0] On the table you can make out [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] The table appears to be empty. This always happens, here in TextWorld![end if] You can see a bed. [if there is something on the s_1]On the bed you can make out [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. Sometimes, just sometimes, TextWorld can just be the worst.[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading east.

infos.name: door
infos.desc: it is what it is, a door [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: safe key
infos.desc: The safe key is surprisingly heavy.

infos.name: glasses
infos.desc: The glasses appears to be well matched to everything else here

infos.name: bottle of water
infos.desc: The bottle of water looks well matched to everything else here

walkthrough: take bottle of water from table

objective: Welcome to another fast paced episode of TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First of all, pick up the safe key from the table. Then, unlock the door. After that, doublecheck that the door is opened. Then, recover the glasses from the table. Then, make an attempt to travel east. Then, recover the bottle of water from the table in the Kitchen. Then, pick up the apple from the table in the Kitchen. And then, eat the apple. Got that? Good!
